scripts.dev: concurrently 'node --inspect node_modules/next/dist/bin/next dev' 'prettier "../**/*" --write --no-editorconfig --config ".prettierrc" --ignore-unknown --no-error-on-unmatched-pattern --log-level silent --check || true' 'chokidar "../**/*" --silent --command "prettier \"{path}\" --write --no-editorconfig --config \".prettierrc\" --ignore-unknown --no-error-on-unmatched-pattern || true"' 'chokidar "src/utils/**/*.js" --ignore "/src/utils/manual/" --initial --silent --command "pnpm exec node rollup.config.mjs || true"'
scripts.tev: concurrently 'node --inspect node_modules/next/dist/bin/next dev --turbo' 'prettier "../**/*" --write --no-editorconfig --config ".prettierrc" --ignore-unknown --no-error-on-unmatched-pattern --log-level silent --check || true' 'chokidar "../**/*" --silent --command "prettier \"{path}\" --write --no-editorconfig --config \".prettierrc\" --ignore-unknown --no-error-on-unmatched-pattern || true"' 'chokidar "src/utils/**/*.js" --ignore "/src/utils/manual/" --initial --silent --command "pnpm exec node rollup.config.mjs || true"'
scripts.watch: concurrently 'next lint || true' 'prettier "../**/*" --write --no-editorconfig --config ".prettierrc" --ignore-unknown --no-error-on-unmatched-pattern --log-level silent --check || true' 'chokidar "../**/*" --silent --command "prettier \"{path}\" --write --no-editorconfig --config \".prettierrc\" --ignore-unknown --no-error-on-unmatched-pattern || true"' 'chokidar "src/utils/**/*.js" --ignore "/src/utils/manual/" --initial --silent --command "pnpm exec node rollup.config.mjs || true"'
